title: Specie insurance (fine art, jewels, precious metals in transit)
dataVerified: Owner, goods description, value, route, security measures, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake specie insurance. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate/specialist. Very high values ($10M-$500M+ for museum exhibitions). Fine art transit. Armored car verification. Auction house requirements.
